name: Simba Source Codes
body:
### Welcome to simba project.
I am currently updating the website. Please be patient with me :)
The forums are still open and you are allowed post and respond to our users. We are still hear during the construction process. Sorry for the minor inconvenience.
If you have any issues or find some errors, please let me know by emailing by at 

Source Code For Download

Posted on Oct 18, 2013 9:52am

Hey everyone!

Since my website is down, and you no longer has access to the Code Bank, I have all the download links attached to this topic that I have wrote (excluding the ones that other tutors on my site have wrote). I have been asked repeatedly by others to send them source code for my tutorials. I have just become really busy and do not have a chance to respond to everyone's emails. Enjoy!

Building A Custom PHP MySQL Forum:
http://timkipptutorials.com/store/downloadables/1_1314947208.zip

Building A Custom PHP MySQL Forum - Database Structure:
http://timkipptutorials.com/store/downloadables/1_1348462018.zip

http://timkipptutorials.com/store/downloadables/1_1315205072.zip

note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
